divs: sighting detailswe were on our couch when the wife noticed bright yellow\orange lights. unsure what the items were. very strange seeing this many objects at one time and not being able to identify them. i felt i needed to take pictures to get a better look. left camera in auto mode and had trouble focusing. i went to get dressed and change lens to get a better shot. the spheres quickly disappeared like shutting a light off.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There has been one other sighting in New Palestine
There were no other sightings in New Palestine on or around July 7th 2012
Summary: 5 orange/yellow spheres, visible for a few minutes and then disapear
